item.title: Software
item.description: R-package pacotest (“Testing for Partial Copulas and the Simplifying Assumption in Vine Copulas”) [ CRAN, Package source, Documentation, Bug reports ] Matlab toolbox VineCopulaMatlab (“A MATLAB toolbox for vine copulas based on C++”) [ Package source, Documentation, Bug reports ] C++ library VineCopulaCPP (“A C++ library for vine copulas”) [ Package source, Documentation, Bug reports ] Matlab code SSMwLS (“State Space Model with Lagged State (SSMwLS) in the measurement equation”) [ Package source, Bug reports ]
